    • isWellFormed

      private boolean isWellFormed()
      Method tests whether the menu structure remains well formed, meaning each menu item is stored in the hashmap as a String, MenuItem pair with String.equals(MenuItem.getName()) == 0
      Returns:
      true if the class is well formed
